entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 100 to 120 mm of rain about the main divide, and 80 to 100 mm within 15 km farther east. Peak rates of 10 to 20 mm/h expected during possible thunderstorms. Freezing level 1800 metres. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.
